title: Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions
description:
Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

Press Add for the associated editors.

a. Multiple selection could be enabled.

c. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked as (default) (refer to perspectives).

NOTES:
KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)
Also:

f. Need a width hint for the dialog.

 g. Why does the File editors Preference page grow in height when it is selected, while no other pages do the same?

I currently have fixes for a, c, f. Need to release.

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)
Released fixes for a, c, f, g
OB: The bug report does not mention the observed behavior.
EB: The bug report does not mention the expected behavior.
SR:
1. Open the preference page and go to 'WorkbenchFile Editors'.
2. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors' list, go to 'External Editors' and select an entry.
3. Switch back to 'Internal Editors'. Notice that there is still no selection.
4. Press OK. This should add the selected external editor to the associated editors list.
